item.description: 2022-08-09 Data Storage Sizes C/C++ Storage Size (bits) Size (bytes) char Byte 8-bits 1 byte short Word 16-bits 2 bytes int Double-word 32-bits 4 bytes long Quadword 64-bits 8 bytes long long Quadword 64-bits 8 bytes int * Quadword 64-bits 8 bytes double Quadword 64-bits 8 bytes float Double quadword 128-bits 16 bytes .
